workshop.title: Oracle Application Express
workshop.description: This series of hands-on labs is designed to teach you how to build applications using Application Express. The primary vehicle for teaching is a single use case which is expanded on with each lab.

labs.title: Trial Account Student Guide
labs.description: This Student Guide should be reviewed if you acquired a Trial Account from Oracle. It provides the required Workshop guidance and prerequisites

labs.title: Lab 100: Getting Started with Oracle Application Express
labs.description: Login to Oracle Application Express and navigate through the major components.

labs.title: Lab 200: Using SQL Workshop
labs.description: Load tables and data and create a look up table.

labs.title: Lab 300: Creating a Database Application
labs.description: Create a database application from scratch, from a spreadsheet, and using a websheet application.

labs.title: Lab 400: Managing Pages in Page Designer
labs.description: Navigate through the page designer panes and add a chart region and edit the chart attributes.
